scenario_text.value:
(Ryo’s down on his hands and knees freaking
out. I don’t think he’s noticed me...)
It’s a dream... Ha ha, just a stupid dream...

I just gotta wake up now, and I’ll be back in
my own bed...just you wait...

Then Mommy...Mommy will be waiting for me.
Mommy... Mommy...

(He’s still muttering to himself...
I’d better leave him alone.)
